import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' export default function PlaceOrderScreen(props) { const cart=useSelector(state=>state.cart); if(!cart.paymentMethod){ props.history.push('/payment'); } const toPrice=(num)=>Number(num.toFixed(2)); cart.itemsPrice= toPrice(cart.cartItems.reduce((a,c)=> a+c.qty*c.price,0) ); return (

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.shippingAddress.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      {cart.cartItems.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty}x${item.price}=%{item.qty*item.price}
      • ))}
) }
